title: 9/14/17 - 'No Opinions, Just Perspective' (Matt Walshn & Bill O'Reilly join Glenn)
description:
ESPN is scrambling and desperate...Massive change is underway, just ask ESPN ...President Trump and his DACA promises...broken already ...Once again President Trump sides with Nancy Pelosi and Chuck Schumer...It's a Bill O'Reilly 'Thursday' ...The President sides with Pelosi and Schumer once again; what gives?...Bill walks Glenn through his thoughts...Dissecting odd Jim Carrey quotes continues ...Gruesome mass murder in Plano, Texas...What happened?

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
